segmentosSRT.text:
But not my money.
They sound like a pack of mules.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: It's not good for the baby.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Who was gambling? I went to watch.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: If nothing else, can't you think of the baby?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: All right, do it yourself. But please don't cry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I've said all there is to say.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Can't you listen just this once?
Quit gambling.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: It's like kicking an opium habit, you know.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Too fast, and boing, you snap!
Could kill you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Only to live a quiet life together.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Fugui, you choose. Gambling or family?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: No, have him wait. I'll be right there.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: This is the last time, okay? I promise.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You can't just win and walk away.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I don't gamble now. Not even in my next life.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I know. Or I wouldn't have come back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I was just teasing Fugui. It's Youqing.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Jiazhen, it's great to have you back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
I'd heard you'd had a boy,
and were living at home.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: But I was too ashamed to see you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Let's put the past behind us...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I've paid the rent with mother's jewelry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: It's crowded with all of us here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I'll tidy up tomorrow. We'll be fine.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Normally she doesn't even get out of bed.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Dad didn't give me much money...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I'll borrow money to set up a shop.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: All I ask is a quiet life together.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I'd like to borrow money to set up a shop.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I want to live. There's nothing like family.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Chunsheng and I are lucky
to meet someone as nice as you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Not as long as you've got your hands up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Dying like this,
their families won't even know.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Mother died without knowing where I was.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: we sang for the Liberation Army.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Suppose I was singing for her, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
kept them fixed on the door,
so sure you'd be back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I never thought I'd make it back alive.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
The new government
paid for mother's burial...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: and gave me this job, delivering water.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: The more I deliver, the more I earn.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: It's been hard on the kids.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: She was fine when I left.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: For a week, she ran a high fever.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: No one thought she'd pull through.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: This is our town leader, Mr. Niu.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
- I heard you got back this morning.
- I'm back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I have come to see if you need anything.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: He has served in the Liberation Army?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I just dragged a cannon and sang opera.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
You were with Chunsheng.
Why isn't he back?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
He joined the army as a driver.
He went south with them.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Fugui, you're back just in time...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Come along and get an education.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Because of the family home,
he's been sentenced a landlord.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: The government wanted part of the house.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: He refused, beat up a cadre...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: and then set fire to the place.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
That wasn't ours.
It was counterrevolutionary timber.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Of course. You're you, he's him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: If I hadn't lost my home to him...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: What class do we belong to?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Surely not. We lost that status to Long'er.
So, what are we?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Sounds okay to me.
And I took part in the revolution.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
- What are you looking for?
- That certificate.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
- In the wash?
- No, here it is.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Are you sure we're just townsfolk?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: It's good to be poor. Nothing like it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Get a frame for it tomorrow.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I'll hang it on the wall.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: To deliver water to the steelworks.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
We're racing towards Communism,
and you worry about food?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: We are setting up communal kitchens.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: We are less politically aware than your son.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
We are just two bullets short
of liberating Taiwan.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
The workers deserve entertaining,
don't they?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You know, I sang for the Liberation Army...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: they captured two mountains a day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
All I've seen at the worksites
are student marching bands.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: We'll spur them on with puppet shows.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Sure we are. We'll definitely liberate Taiwan.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: That guy's word is law? The government?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Can't you see I'm doing this for our family?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: If you indulge him, we'll all go to ruin.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Isn't he your own flesh and blood?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You, looking after us! After all these years.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Poor Fengxia.
Can't even talk back to bullies.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing adores her. And you'd hit him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, daddy wants you to see the show.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Do you like hearing daddy sing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Mommy doesn't either. He's so smug.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Let's play a practical joke on him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Take him tea full of vinegar.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Fugui, Jiazhen,
you've made a real contribution.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
There'll be dumplings
at the canteen tonight...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: with a whole pig stuffed in each one!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Eat your fill, and then we'll continue.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
We've made enough steel
for three cannon balls.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: One to land on Chiang Kai-shek's bed...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: and the last in the toilet!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
He won't be able to sleep or eat
or ever take a dump...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Let them sleep. They'll eat later.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Pack a lunchbox. I'll wake him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
He's not going anywhere.
He hasn't slept in days.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
- The District Chief is coming.
- So?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: A kid still has to sleep.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Smelting steel is a duty.
We can't be politically backward.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Mr. Niu praised us in front of everyone.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You have to go smelt steel.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Must not be politically backward.
You can sleep later.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: put your dumplings in hot water.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Make sure you make them hot enough.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Cold dumplings are bad for the tummy.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: If Youqing does as daddy says...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: our lives will get better and better.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: When it grows up, it becomes a goose.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: And that'll turn into a sheep.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: The sheep will turn into an ox.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
And there'll be dumplings and meat
every day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I had only one son, Chunsheng!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: The District Chief is upset, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: How can I ever make it up?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I think you should go, Chief.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Put these old things to new use.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Don't you see what they are?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: They always remind Jiazhen of Youqing.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Let's not bring up the past.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Burn them, okay?
I've got other people to see.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng has asked me many times...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: to get you a better job. What do you think?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Jiazhen's health is poor.
If we're together, I can look after her.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Let's not let her in on it for now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I've found just the man for her.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: He works in a factory in the county seat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: He is the leader of the factory's Red Guards.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Sounds too good. Will he go for Fengxia?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Yes, and run if he has to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: No, it was an accident at work.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Shall we invite him over?
Fengxia can check him out.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Does she mind us playing matchmaker?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
She's not opposed,
she does fret about leaving us.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Comrade Wan works
at the East Wind Factory.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
His father and grandfather
were workers, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia's father took part in the revolution.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
The Liberation Army
gave me that certificate.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Have something to eat first. Lunch is ready.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: His leg's not so bad, and he seems nice.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Who's to say he'll like our Fengxia?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: He only glanced at her, and wouldn't stay.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: If it doesn't work out, we'll keep looking.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
He doesn't like Fengxia,
so he tears the place down.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Mr. Niu said he was a Red Guard.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't rush off!
- I'll make you something to eat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
He painted all the Chairman Maos
in our factory!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I'll get some water so you can wash up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: let's make the wedding a real occasion.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Today comrades, Wan Erxi and Xu Fengxia...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: In good times, we think of Chairman Mao.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: At least it's loud enough for her to hear.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Sit with us for a bit.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Come as soon as the water's ready.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng came to wish Fengxia well.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You can't go on avoiding him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Can't we put this behind us?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: If only Youqing had been here today.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
I just came from the hospital.
The doctor says it's due in autumn.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia's going to be a mother.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi, when you went to the hospital today...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: what did they say about Fengxia's health?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Still, you can't be too careful.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
After the birth,
you'll stay with us for a while.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Spend as much time as you can with her.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: When I was pregnant with Fengxia...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: And will be better for your child.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: We haven't taken a photo in years.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: have a photo taken every year.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: We've no photos of Fengxia as a child.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: have a photo taken every year.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Haven't had much to do with him for years.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: All my debts will have been paid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Don't go getting any stupid ideas.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You must bear it, no matter what!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You can't take that road yourself.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I don't want to live anymore!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Let's say we accept this money.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Keep it for us. There's plenty of time.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I know how difficult it must be...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: but you've got to pull through...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Fengxia's about to have a baby.
It's to thank the matchmaker!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi sent word from the hospital.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: She's in labor. We're on our way there.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Another working class member on the way!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: So we've got to get going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: We'll bring the baby to see you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
- But you won't stay?
- No, thanks.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Never mind. Let's go. Don't worry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I'm no longer head of the township.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I have to confess my crimes.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I have faith in the Party.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I've always followed Chairman Mao's path.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Niu, don't let it get to you. Take care!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Go ask where the doctors are.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: We must find a good doctor.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Even if he only stands by, we would relax.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
To show him the heirs
of this new, Red world.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: No, it's better if I wear it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I'm just going to see him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Hasn't been fed for three days!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia's child won't be mute, will he?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Of course not. She wasn't born that way.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Erxi's is a work-related injury.
It's not hereditary.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Anyway, it's bad luck to talk like that.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: to think of a name for the kid?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't be stupid.
- It was a joke.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: are not recorded in the Register of Names.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: He doesn't know those kids exist...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: That's what the old folks say.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Okay, then Little Bun it is.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Later, his dad can give him a proper name.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Fine. Mother and son are fine.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi, seeing as they are both fine...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: why don't you see Dr. Wang back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
He's been locked up without food.
He scoffed those buns.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: She's bleeding! We don't know what to do.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Yes, and I'll make some noodles.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I want to visit Fengxia's grave again...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I'll find a home for them when we get back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: she should take a photo every year.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: If I hadn't given Dr. Wang those buns...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: He could have saved our Fengxia.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: He always carries on like this.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: We shouldn't have given him water.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: People say, once you drink water...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: one bun in the stomach turns to seven.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: This box is bigger, isn't it?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: They'll have more room to run around.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: the chickens will turn into geese...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: and the geese will turn into sheep...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: and the sheep will turn into oxen.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You will ride on an ox's back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Little Bun won't ride on an ox...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: and life will get better and better.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02
